item.title: USA GDP Composition 2024-2025: Pie Chart, Sector Breakdown & Economic Analysis
item.description: Comprehensive USA GDP composition analysis for 2024-2025 with interactive pie charts. Explore US GDP by sector breakdown, components including consumption (68.2%), investment (17.6%), government spending (17.2%), exports and imports. Latest economic data and visualizations.

item.title: France GDP Composition 2023 - Pie Chart & Components Breakdown
item.description: France's GDP composition 2023 pie chart showing diversified economy breakdown. France balanced strong domestic consumption with significant government spending across tourism, aerospace, and luxury goods sectors.
